remarks: Define less-than ordering for posets and related structures.  Unlike ~ df-base and ~ df-ple , this is a derived component extractor and not an extensible structure component extractor that defines the poset. (Contributed by NM, 12-Oct-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)
statement: df-plt $p |- lt = ( p e. _V |-> ( ( le ` p ) \ _I ) ) $.
